title: Raiders Blow Lead Against Chiefs, Falling to 1-4
description: Rewarded for boldness earlier in the game, Las Vegas tried for a go-ahead 2-point conversion rather than a tie. The attempt failed, and the team fell to 1-4.
dc:creator: Victor Mather
media:description: Derek Carr and the Las Vegas Raiders led by 20-10 at halftime, but went on to lose to Kansas City, 30-29.
